tool_description: Use unique images for your projects
name: Background Pattern
title: Background Pattern

api_list.name: Using Color Param
api_list.description: Apply any colour to the SVG

api_list.name: All Params
Using Key param
api_list.description:
Send **KEY** param to create exact SVG.
That can be useful if you want to have the same SVG twice

api_list.name: Using Type Param
api_list.description: Using **Type** param you can choose if you want to fetch the SVG image or the URI
